DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect low calorie high fat/protein diet body fat body composition overweight obese subject . The investigator also test effect diet secondary outcome : fluid electrolyte balance , cholesterol , inflammation , sugar insulin metabolism , fat hormone , blood pressure feeling fullness .
DOC.brief_title: High Fat - High Protein Diet Treatment Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: Participation study require 2 screen visit outpatient clinic , participant qualify , 10 inpatient study week . Subjects admit Rockefeller University Hospital 10 week in-patient phase study . The first 2 week consist weight stabilization period , subject require eat average American diet . This follow 6 week weight loss period subject put low calorie high fat/protein diet . During weight loss period , calorie cut 50 % compare weight stabilization period . This follow 2 week weight maintenance period calorie add diet maintain new weight . Appropriate adjustment make keep subject 's weight stable . During entire inpatient study , subject consume one multivitamin per day ( Centrum , always complete , A Zinc ) one iron supplement per day . In addition , unlimited access zero calorie liquid ( water/diet soda ) available subject encourage maintain usual activity level . Females reproductive age need make sure become pregnant inpatient study . Urine test pregnancy phase study .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 30 34.9 BMI 25 29.9 waist circumference > 88cm ( 35in ) Premenopausal High Blood Pressure High Cholesterol Diabetes Anemia Liver disease Kidney disease HIV positive Syphilis Hepatitis B/C positive
